scripts.p-tapit-dev: cross-env ENV=TAPIT_DEV gulp build && cd home && ng deploy home-dev --preview
scripts.p-tapit-qa: cross-env ENV=TAPIT_QA gulp build && cd home && ng deploy home-qa --preview
scripts.p-tapit-prod: cross-env ENV=TAPIT_PRODUCTION gulp build && cd home && ng deploy home --preview
scripts.d-tapit-dev: cross-env ENV=TAPIT_DEV gulp build && cd home && ng deploy home-dev
scripts.d-tapit-qa: cross-env ENV=TAPIT_QA gulp build && cd home && ng deploy home-qa
scripts.d-tapit-prod: cross-env ENV=TAPIT_PRODUCTION gulp build && cd home && ng deploy home
